name: Fish Tank Simulator
description:
Game Description

Simple fish tank simulator showcasing obstacle avoidance, pathing, and state transitions. Take care of two types of fish! 

Controls

  • A pleco that will get hungry. 
    • Feed him with a left click. 
  • A gold fish that will get hungry or bored.
    • Feed them with a right click. 
    • Drop a new fish to interest them by right-clicking while pressing the 'F'
